dublin_core.dcvalue: One of the most common reasons for medication non adherence for asthma patients is forgetfulness Daily medication reminder system interventions in the form of text messages automated phone calls and audiovisual reminder devices can potentially address this problem The aim of this review was to assess the effectiveness of reminder systems on patient daily asthma medication adherence
The Journal of asthma : official journal of the Association for the Care of Asthma
Patient reminder systems and asthma medication adherence: a systematic review.
